text: Hey team, looking to work with Peyton Stewart for Qantas. Budget is approx $34,339 - need 1 x Radio interview, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x Pinterest pin, 2 x Facebook post, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel. 7 weeks exclusivity, 4 month engagement. Usage: 9 months. Start date: September 2025. Need to confirm: usage rights
